solution_line_template: The selling price for each bar of chocolate is {total_selling_price}/{num_bars}=${<<{total_selling_price}/{num_bars}={selling_price_per_bar}>>}{selling_price_per_bar}.

The profit for each bar of chocolate is {selling_price_per_bar}-{cost_per_bar}-{packaging_cost_per_bar}=${<<{selling_price_per_bar}-{cost_per_bar}-{packaging_cost_per_bar}={profit_per_bar}>>}{profit_per_bar}.
